segments.text: This kitchen setup is just gross to look at.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spilling everywhere from that careless faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor— who knows what it'll soak into.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman standing there, foot in the filth, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids rummaging in the cookie jar like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is filthy from the floor, and he's climbing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand deep in the jar, probably getting crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting, but the whole thing feels sneaky and messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the doors— what a sloppy sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is clean, unlike this indoor swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the negligence; it's all so avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the water before it gets worse!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, the bunched towel on the plate looks dingy too.
segments.speaker: PAR
